```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r include=FALSE}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(tidyverse))
library(DT)
```

```{r load-iss, include=FALSE}
load(here::here("data", "issues.RData"))
```

```{r url}
issues <- issues %>%
  mutate(url = str_glue("https://github.com/{owner}/{repo}/issues/{number}"))
```



```{r select-iss, include=FALSE}
issues_pared <- issues %>%
  select(c("repo", "title", "comments", "bug", "reaction_p1", "reaction_other"))
```


```{r dt, echo=FALSE}
datatable(issues_pared, options = list(pageLength = 20)) %>%
  formatStyle('reaction_p1',  color = 'black', fontWeight = 'bold')
```
